external_games.name: Deep Pockets: Super Pro Pool and Billiards
Deep Pockets: Super Pro Pool and Billiards

name: Deep Pockets-Super Pro Pool and Billiards
summary: Deep Pockets: Super Pro Pool and Billiards is a billiards game for the Intellivision. It was developed for market in 1990 but never released. It is notable for being the last game completed for the Intellivision console. It was later included in intellivision lives.
